main event: A civilian observed a saucer-shaped object that was about 15 feet in diameter for 5 seconds in December 1960.
interesting points: The object changed direction several times, traveling at an estimated speed of Mach 2.2.
The observation lasted for 4 to 5 minutes.
The observer reported seeing 4 green lights on the object.
The object appeared solid and sharply defined.
The observer was stunned by the object, like an electric transformer.
